A stone cold CLASSIC.  

It set the bar with it's realistic physics, atmospheric audio and graphical fidelity in the mid 2000s.

Played and loved, many times over.

Ein Klassiker, der seines Gleichens sucht. Was ich bei moderneren Titeln ein wenig vermisse, bekomme ich bei Half Life 2 nonstop. Eine unglaubliche Geschichte, die Action reicher nicht sein kann! Vor allem die Länge finde ich super. Lange aber ohne dass ich das Gefühl gehabt habe, sie würden es künstlich mit ultra langen Videofrequenzen hinauszögern. Action ist angesagt und dass ohne pause.

Halo 2 is easily the best game of its generation. You play as the legendary vault dweller masterchef, as you transverse the Australian desert looking for guzzoline. The online is well good due to the way you can punch guys and they die. The plasma rifle was truly an innovative to include in a FPS, giving the player the abilty to manipluate objects in the world to both solve physics puzzles, use as an offensive weapon and also fucking melt shit. I like the use of including a token black guy into the game so that the developers Id software dont come off as racist douchefucks. To top it all off, the game came out originally on the SEGA gemisish which is undoubtably the best tv ever made by Sandsung, the game was then later ported to PC by a small company known as Millie's Cookies who then established the best RTS franchise of all time, the "IVE LOST ALL HOPE" series, AKA FINAL FANATSEE. Anyway you should buy this game so that John Cormacks death wasnt in vain and that his son get tonnes of money to spend on hookers and coke.

One of the best games ever made, bar none.  This game set the stage for real time physics in games, others had attempted prior but this game really shinned with it.  The engine was ahead of its time, and is still very enjoyable today.  Here are the pros/cons.

Pros:
- Endless fun with the source engine, I've put in well over 1,000 hours playing Half-life, Counter-strike, and Dod: Source.
- Smooth gameplay, with an engaging story.
- Customization is beyond anything i've seen in a game.  You can literally make an entire game if you want to.  
- Replayability is high, no playthrough is the same.  Pretty good for a linear game.
- Mods like Counter-strike bring endless hours of fun.

Cons:
- Lack of a sequel is a major disappointment.  This has nothing to do with the gameplay or anything, but the shear lack of communication from Valve on a sequel to a flagship game is very disheartening.


Thats is really.  This game is pretty flawless, definetly play this if you are a video game fan.

Easily the best PC game since the original StarCraft. Amazing story, scripted sequences without cutscenes, creative physics, the Gravity Gun, beautiful graphics, interesting characters and enemies, intense gunplay; this game has it all. No matter what genre you're into.

老游戏了，04年和毁灭战士，孤岛惊魂并称三大显卡杀手，V社历时5年打造出来的半条命续作半条命2。当时玩通关了以后已经没什么印象了，如今正版都快发霉了我才想到要再次通关一下这部经典，Source引擎的强大功力使得游戏画面放到今天也不显得过时，游戏人物采用了面部表情捕捉技术，所以在对话中人物的表情十分丰富，中文字幕加中文语音的设定也让很多国内玩家也能轻松加愉快的体验游戏，故事主要讲述在半条命1世界观的20年以后，地球已被联合军攻下，人类快要接近灭亡，此时Gman唤醒了Freeman博士，然后人型自走高达Freeman再一次拯救人类的故事，场景得益于新引擎，比前作扩大了不止几倍，让我们游戏的代入感十足，作为04年的游戏，它的第12章着实把我惊到了，场景之宏达丝毫不逊于现在的大作，一句话，半条命系列绝对是游戏史上里程碑式的作品，我没什么好说的。 100/10

Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia , una gran elaboración en la trama y un apartado técnico impresionante . El motor Source es de los más sólidos que existen actualemente y a pesar de los años los gráficos siguen siendo geniales. 
Es un juego que debería ser obligatorio en cualquier amante de los videojuegos , con esta entrega el mundo (dis)tópico que nos proponen , vemos toques de grandes obras de la literatura como Orguell y Huxley , ya que hacen muchas referencias. 
Un 10 para Valve

11 years after this game was released, I still find it a thrill to play it over again. That's how a truly great game should be: a timeless classic that never gets old. Valve patched the old Source Engine to a more updated version, but the difference is only subtle.
Absolutly fantastic, I enjoyed every moment of this game

This one of the best first person shooter games I've ever played, plain and simple.

Half Life 2 begins 20 years after the original Half Life. As Gordon Freeman awakens from stasis he finds himself on a train heading to City 17 which is overrun by the combine. You find yourself as the leader of the resistance and you must take down the Combine. 

Half Life 2 is at this point one of the best received games and I'm sure pretty much everyone has played it. If not well what the hell are you doing reading this review ? You need to go buy this game straight away and play it right now.

The game is a simple first person shooter, but it does plenty things different than the regular first person shooters. You have a health bar and you have to do platforming to solve some of the puzzles.  Not to mention the source engine physics are absolutely insane. 

For a game that came out back in 2004 it still looks amazing. Now while it does have so low res textures it's still looks breath taking, like in the final chapters.

The game for the most part is pretty easy. I played through the game without a problem, even though some segments were tough due to the fast movement you have to pull off to avoid gunfire. Not to mention the Strider battles are incredibly intense and quite difficult.

The game took me 10 hours to finish. I felt this was the perfect amount of time for the price I paid for it and this was worth every single penny.

Apart from the single playthrough there's not much replay value. The only reason to replay it twice is to look for the G-Man Easter eggs. 

In the end Half Life 2 is a fantastic game. It's a must own for everyone who is a gamer. This game is a piece of history and without a doubt one of the best games I have ever played in my entire life.

I experienced zero problems while playing the game. I ran the game on ultra settings 60 FPS the entire time of playing. This game runs really well and should run on pretty much all systems.

Final Rating:
9.5/10 -  A Must own and must play

If you liked this review please consider giving it a thumbs up and if you disliked post in the comments what you disliked about the review.

For more reviews follow Snort's Review curator page [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/snortsreviews#curation]here[/url] - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!

Be the Freeman, the one free man.

Half-Life 2 deși nu la fel de impresionant acum în 2015, reușește să ofere un gameplay bun și o poveste și mai bună.


Este unul din acele jocuri pe care un utilizator de PC trebuie să le joace. Vă spun sincer, Half-Life 2 nu mai este acea bomboană, acel joc minunant pentru un gamer care nu l-a jucat inca. Pentru ca cel mai probabil, cateva din conceptele de joc au fost imprumutate si la cele mai moderne, iar intrand in Half Life 2 le veti recunoaste.


Insa fără urmă de îndoială, multe din acele concepte care în alte jocuri sunt executate slab sau mai prost, în Half Life 2 ele functioneaza foarte bine.


Ce este interesant este că în Half-Life 2 toată povestea se desfășoară în joc, cu foarte puține momente randate in-game. Adică exact cum vezi jocul așa va fi și povestea. Acesta nu prezintă cadre randate în CGI sau alte lucruri care par scoase din joc, oferind o uniformitate foarte bună.


Este un succesor demn pentru Half-Life 1 și deși nu vom avea parte de întâlniri masive cu fințele de pe planeta Xen, vom putea să observăm cum elita asuprește omenirea, iar un grup mic de revoluționari încearcă să răstoarne formațiunea Combine, o formațiune care conform deviziei servește omenirea.


Povestea este cu siguranță foarte bună dar există și momente un pic mai plictisitoare, însă nu destul de plictisitoare pentru a te face să pui pauză și să ieși din joc.

Există și secvențe puzzle relativ ușoare dar și lupte mai dificile care te vor face să le resetezi de câteva ore.


Personajul care ne-a urmărit până acum G-MAN își va face și el prezența, iar cei mai agili îl vor putea vedea în diferitele niveluri din joc dar și în cadre destul de importante pe de-a cursul poveștii, însă în afară de niște comentarii in anumite momente, acesta nu va fi destul de relevant.



[h1]Ca o concluzie[/h1]
Oricum Half-Life 2 (inclusiv Episode One și Episode Two) este un joc care trebuie jucat pentru oricine care vrea să se denumească PC Gamer. Povestea celor 4 (inclusiv Half-Life 1) se îmbină foarte bine, iar din nefericire finalul celui de-al doilea joc este presărat de referințe către compania Aperture (Portal) și despre posibilele întâlniri cu forța superioară ce guvernează formațiunea Combine.


Gameplayul funcționează bine și pot spune că nu am avut nici o problemă, atât tehnică(crashuri, glitch-uri, bug-uri) cât și logică (momente prost alese, alegeri care nu fac sens, probleme de plasare ale misiunii, obiectivelor)


*Rectific - singura problema tehnica pe care am avut-o a fost in capitolul Anticitizen One, unde jocul a dat crash de zeci de ori cand am incarcat o salvare. Cel mai probabil in salvare era un bug care se declansa de fiecare data cand treceai pe langa un obiect. Problema s-a rezolvat cu incarcarea unei salvari mai vechi decat cea buguita*


În final vom fi lăsați cu o senzație ce ne va face să jucăm din primul moment Half-Life 3, un joc care cel mai probabil, nu se va lansa niciodată.

Als ich von Half Life 2 hörte, hielt ich nicht wirklich viel davon. Doch jetzt (nach zweimaligem Durchspielen) kann ich eindeutig verstehen warum sich jeder einen dritten Teil wünscht. Da ich nichts spoilern möchte, kommt hier nur eine Auflistung positver und negativer Punkte, um sich ein Bild dieses großartigen Spiels machen zu können:

+ geniales Leveldesign
+ gut geschriebene Dialoge
+ sehr gut erzählte Story
+ Waffen fühlen sich kraftvoll an
+ schnelles Movement
+ gute Grafik (für damalige Verhältnisse)

Скучный шутер который на мой взгляд даже в половину не так хорош как первая часть. Нет той атмосферы, сюжет скомкан, и толком не рассказан. В начале подумал ну вот то самое , ну сейчас начнётся. В итоге добрую половину игры ожидал когда же " это самое " начнётся. Не дождался. Потом была единственная мысль когда это закончится. Единственное что всё это как то спасает, действительно хорошая физика и музыка, тут всё как надо. В итоге я разочарован и не получил для себя достойного продолжения первой части, а жаль.
